api_list.name: Get a List of Bank Sector Groups
api_list.description: Get a List of Bank Sector Groups
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://argaam-data-apis-free.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/json/facts-statistics/get-bank-sector-reports"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "argaam-data-apis-free.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
